where.if: AND t1.id in (select l.accountId from log_mbrlogin l where l.loginIp like concat('%', #{loginIp},'%') group by l.accountId)

mapper.select:
select t1.id,t1.loginname, t0.agyaccount, t0.memo agymemo, t1.realname, t5.groupName, wa.balance, t1.registertime, t1.logintime, t1.available from mbr_account t1 left join agy_account t0 on t1.cagencyId = t0.id left join mbr_wallet wa on t1.loginName = wa.loginName left join log_mbrregister t4 on t1.loginName=t4.loginName left join mbr_group t5 on t1.groupId=t5.id
order by t1.logintime desc

SELECT distinct ma.id,ma.loginname, agy.agyaccount, agy.memo agymemo, g.groupname, ma.realname, ma.registertime,ma.logintime, (SELECT SUM(deposit.depositAmount) FROM fund_deposit deposit where deposit.accountid = #{accountId} and deposit.status = 1 ) totaldeposit, (SELECT SUM(w.actualarrival) FROM fund_acc_withdraw w where w.accountid = #{accountId} and w.`status`=1) totalWithdrawal, ( select sum(t.bonusAmount) from ( -- 红利 select t.bonusAmount,accountId from opr_act_bonus t where status = 1 and accountId = #{accountId} union all -- 任务 select t.bonusAmount,accountId from task_bonus t where accountId = #{accountId} ) t ) totalProfit, (select sum(rpt.payout) from rpt_bet_rcd_day rpt where rpt.username = ma.loginname ) totalPayout, (select mm.memo from mbr_memo mm where mm.accountid = #{accountId} order by id desc limit 1) memo from mbr_account ma left join agy_account agy on ma.cagencyid = agy.id left join mbr_group g on g.id = ma.groupid where ma.id = #{accountId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT l.accountId) loginIpNum FROM log_mbrlogin n INNER JOIN log_mbrlogin l ON n.loginIp = l.loginIp WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT l.accountId) deviceuuidNum FROM mbr_account_device n INNER JOIN mbr_account_device l ON n.deviceuuid = l.deviceuuid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} and n.deviceuuid != ''

select count(distinct t.accountId ) totalBonusAmountNum from ( -- 红利 select bonusAmount,accountId from opr_act_bonus tb where tb.`status` = 1 and tb.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM log_mbrlogin n INNER JOIN log_mbrlogin l ON n.loginIp = l.loginIp WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} ) union all
-- 任务 select bonusAmount,accountId from task_bonus t where t.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM log_mbrlogin n INNER JOIN log_mbrlogin l ON n.loginIp = l.loginIp WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} ) ) t

select count(distinct t.accountId ) totalBonusAmountNum from ( -- 红利 select bonusAmount,accountId from opr_act_bonus tb where tb.`status` = 1 and tb.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM mbr_account_device n INNER JOIN mbr_account_device l ON n.deviceuuid = l.deviceuuid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} and n.deviceuuid != '' ) union all -- 任务 select bonusAmount,accountId from task_bonus t where t.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM mbr_account_device n INNER JOIN mbr_account_device l ON n.deviceuuid = l.deviceuuid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} and n.deviceuuid != '' ) ) t

SELECT l.accountid,l.loginName,y.agyaccount,l.deviceUuid,l.deviceType,l.createtime loginTime FROM mbr_account_device n INNER JOIN mbr_account_device l ON n.deviceuuid = l.deviceuuid LEFT JOIN mbr_account t ON t.id = l.accountid LEFT JOIN agy_account y ON y.id = t.cagencyid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} and n.deviceuuid != '' group by l.loginName order by l.loginName

select m.accountid,t.loginname,y.agyaccount,o.loginIp,count(m.bonusAmount) totalBonusAmountNum from ( -- 红利 select bonusAmount,accountId from opr_act_bonus tb where tb.`status` = 1 and tb.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM log_mbrlogin n INNER JOIN log_mbrlogin l ON n.loginIp = l.loginIp WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} ) union all
-- 任务 select bonusAmount,accountId from task_bonus t where t.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM log_mbrlogin n INNER JOIN log_mbrlogin l ON n.loginIp = l.loginIp WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} ) ) m LEFT JOIN mbr_account t ON t.id = m.accountid LEFT JOIN agy_account y ON y.id = t.cagencyid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT distinct l.accountId, l.loginIp FROM log_mbrlogin n INNER JOIN log_mbrlogin l ON n.loginIp = l.loginIp WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} ) o on m.accountId = o.accountId group by m.accountId

select m.accountid,t.loginname,y.agyaccount,o.deviceuuid,o.devicetype,count(m.bonusAmount) totalBonusAmountNum from ( -- 红利 select bonusAmount,accountId from opr_act_bonus tb where tb.`status` = 1 and tb.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM mbr_account_device n INNER JOIN mbr_account_device l ON n.deviceuuid = l.deviceuuid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} and n.deviceuuid != '' ) union all -- 任务 select bonusAmount,accountId from task_bonus t where t.accountid in ( SELECT DISTINCT l.accountId FROM mbr_account_device n INNER JOIN mbr_account_device l ON n.deviceuuid = l.deviceuuid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} and n.deviceuuid != '' ) ) m LEFT JOIN mbr_account t ON t.id = m.accountid LEFT JOIN agy_account y ON y.id = t.cagencyid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT l.accountId,l.deviceuuid,l.devicetype FROM mbr_account_device n INNER JOIN mbr_account_device l ON n.deviceuuid = l.deviceuuid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} and n.deviceuuid != '' group by l.accountId ) o on m.accountId = o.accountId group by m.accountId

SELECT l.accountid,l.loginName,l.loginIp,l.logintime,y.agyaccount FROM log_mbrlogin n INNER JOIN log_mbrlogin l ON n.loginIp = l.loginIp LEFT JOIN mbr_account t ON t.id = l.accountid LEFT JOIN agy_account y ON y.id = t.cagencyid WHERE n.accountId = #{accountId} AND l.accountId != #{accountId} group by l.accountId order by l.logintime
